name: jspecies
publications: Biological Sciences - Microbiology: Michael Richter and Ramon Rosselló-Móra Shifting the genomic gold standard for the prokaryotic species definition PNAS 2009 106 (45) 19126-19131; published ahead of print October 23, 2009,
description: JSpecies is an easy to use, biologist-centric software designed to measure the probability if two genomes belonging to the same species or not.
